results.protectionTitle: Method and system for initializing a neural network
results.grantingInstitutionName: Urząd Patentowy jednego z krajów OECD
results.productDescription: A method and a system are disclosed for initializing a pre-trained neural network, the method comprising obtaining a pre-trained neural network having an output layer, amending the output layer of the pre-trained neural network, wherein the amending comprises updating each weight of the output layer according to a function that maximizes the entropy of the output classes probability, wherein the function depends on a parameter controlling a proportion of error of the output classes probability such as it decreases the variance of the output classes probability, and providing the initialized pre-trained neural network.

productTitles.value: Method and system for initializing a neural network
